byline.contributor: Neil MacFarquhar contributed reporting from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: The diplomat has been accused of sending a violent message during a United Nations Human Rights Council discussion on protecting rights defenders.

headline.main: Russian Diplomat Is Accused of Threatening Rights Activist on Twitter
